Events that occurred on 18 July

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1962 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter 238.
1970 - Author and scholar Ármann Jakobsson is born.
1971 - Actress Sarah McLeod is born.
1998 - Mythcon 29 in Wheaton, Illinois.
2009 - Mythcon 40 in Los Angeles, California.
2010 - Tolkien Thing 2010 in Bad Hersfeld, Germany.
2010 - Mythcon 41 in Dallas, Texas.
2011 - Mythcon 42 in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 3018:
Gandalf is held captive by Saruman on the pinnacle of Orthanc.
Boromir travels towards Rivendell to ask for counsel.
T.A. 3019:
Éomer returns to Minas Tirith, after settling administrative affairs in Rohan.[1]
A great feast is held in Merethrond: Gimli and Éomer come to an agreement over the lady Galadriel.

content.title: References
content.content: ↑ J.R.R. Tolkien, The Lord of the Rings, Appendix B, "The Chief Days from the Fall of Barad-dûr to the End of the Third Age"
